org.gvsig.graph.core
Class NodesDriver

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.graph.core.NodesDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.hardcode.driverManager.Driver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.GDBMSDriver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.ObjectDriver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.ReadAccess, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.BoundedShapes, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.VectorialDriver
public class NodesDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.VectorialDriver, com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.driver.ObjectDriver, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.BoundedShapes

Driver wrapper around nodes from a network. It may be useful to show the nodes as a layer without consuming more memory. Is a tmpLayer, and when the layer is created, it should be uses with some BeforeSavingListener in order to delete the layer before saving project. See AddLayerNodesExtension (TODO)

Author:
Fco. José Peñarrubia
